page.title: 09Clothes in East Leicester.
page.content: In summer a typical outfit for an English girl would be a light dress, skirt or pair of shorts,with a T-shirt & ankle socks. She would wear summer shoes like sandals or maybe some flat shoes with a V-shape that you put your big toe in. Perhaps even shoes called 'jelly beans' because they are made of brightly coloured plastic woven in patterns to make a shoe. You can get a bag in the same pattern. Boys would wear cotton trousers or shorts,a T-shirt & trainers. In winter a girl would wear jeans & a sweat shirt,or a skirt with thick tights or long socks & ankle boots. She would have to wear a coat or jacket to go out. A boy would wear jeans or thick trousers like cords (made of corduroy) & a sweat shirt or jumper. They might wear a shirt & tie if they wanted to look smart.
